summary: Millenia is an Ice Elementalist Mer, who studies at The College of Winterhold. She can be found in the Hall of Countenance, upstairs near the alchemy lab.
descriptionHtml:
Millenia is an Ice Elementalist Mer, who studies at The College of Winterhold. She can be found in the Hall of Countenance, upstairs near the alchemy lab.
____
She is marriageable and essential.
____
Follower mods do not require other .ESPs and is standalone.
____
VOTE for the next DRAGONONION follower at the link below!

http://theperfectonion.weebly.com/vote-for-the-next-onion.html
____
Credits/Mods used/Mods in screenshots:
- Racemenu
- NIFmerge
- Coverwomen #2
- SG body textures
- Lovely Hairs
- Calientes Vanilla Outfits for CBBE
- TERA Armors CBBE by frigus (Nightwinder Armor in screenshots)
- Realistic Lighting without Post Processing
- SKSE
- Creation Kit
author: THEDRAGONONION
